Reviews.Title: VGA connector was loose.
Reviews.Author: Javier Osses
Reviews.Content: Upon opening the box I encounter a loose screw inside the bag dvr, to my surprise, the vga connector was not anchored, so I had to open the DVR and anchor it in place, the other screw was inside the box, luckily that was not lost on the trip to my home, so that, I did not put the other stars.

ProductInfo.Features:
Real-Time High Resolution Recording, H.264 Compression Technology
Intuitive Graphic User Interface, Quick Research, Easy Backup
Remote Motoring / Control via CMS or Web Browers
Multi-User management, Live View on Smart Phones and Playback on iPhones, Free iPad/iPad2/iPhone/Blackberry/Android App Available
2 Year Warranty and Free Life-Time Technical Support
ProductInfo.Name: R-Tech 16 Channel H.264 Security CCTV Digital Video Recorder DVR with 1 Terabyte Hard Drive + FREE Remote Monitoring / Control via Web Browsers + Live View on Smartphones and Playback on iPhones
